network.server

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View
      • network.server.RemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<java.lang.String>

    public class RemoteView
extends View
implements Observer<java.lang.String>
    Class that obtains the message from the socket and sends it to the correct remote view to be handled.
    Author:
    Michele Leva
